name: bbn\User\Manager

creation.subject: Account created
creation.text:
A new user has been created for you.
Please click the link below in order to activate your account:
%1$s

password.subject: Password change
password.text:
You can click the following link to change your password:
%1$s

hotlink.subject: Hotlink
hotlink.text:
You can click the following link to access directly your account:
%1$s
